overview: John Rabasa was most recently EVP, Experience Strategy for Publicis Modem USA. He formerly ran the San Francisco office of Publicis Modem, focusing on business operations, client relationships, and new business development. Prior to joining Publicis Modem, he led online product development for ePals and U.S. News Ventures. Earlier in his career, John served in several leadership roles at AOL, where he led product design and development for AOL.com and was also head of product development for Moviefone. Prior to AOL John was a foundational member of R/GA Interactive, the innovative New York digital agency, where he was the strategic and creative lead for Bed Bath and Beyond, Sesame Workshop, and Discovery Communications.
